glsa.title: LTris: Buffer overflow
glsa.synopsis: LTris is vulnerable to a buffer overflow which could lead to the execution of arbitrary code.

description.p: LTris is vulnerable to a buffer overflow when reading the global highscores file.

impact.p: By modifying the global highscores file a malicious user could trick another user to execute arbitrary code.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All LTris users should upgrade to the latest version:
